name: Santa's Grindset
description:
What do you think Santa does in his free time? Relax? Think not, for you will have to dip into Santa's daily workflow and work out the answer for yourself. 

In this game you are tasked to win with the only ability: teleportation of non-living matter. Be it gifts, dummies or flares. You can do it. 

For noobs:
Controls:
Esc/P-pause menu
WASD- move
Mouse to rotate
1 2 3 - select ability.
